verses.text: And \w I|strong="G2504"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, when I \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G2596"\w* \w excellency|strong="G5247"\w* of \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w declaring|strong="G2605"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* the \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w determined|strong="G2919"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w know|strong="G1492"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w save|strong="G1487"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G5126"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w weakness|strong="G0769"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w trembling|strong="G5156"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w speech|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w* \add was\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w enticing|strong="G3981"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* of \w man’s|strong="G0442"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w demonstration|strong="G0585"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w power|strong="G1411"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* should \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w stand|strong="G5600"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w power|strong="G1411"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Howbeit|strong="G1161"\w* we \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that are \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w*: \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* of the \w princes|strong="G0758"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* come to \w nought|strong="G2673"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* we \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* the \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* a \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w*, \add even\add* the \w hidden|strong="G0613"\w* \add wisdom\add*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w ordained|strong="G4309"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w world|strong="G0165"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*:

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of the \w princes|strong="G0758"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w had|strong="G1487"\w* they \w known|strong="G1097"\w* \add it\add*, they \w would|strong="G4717"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w have|strong="G0302"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \w Eye|strong="G3788"\w* \w hath|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w seen|strong="G1492"\w*, \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w ear|strong="G3775"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* have \w entered|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1909"\w* the \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, the things \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w prepared|strong="G2090"\w* for \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \add them\add* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w searcheth|strong="G2045"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w yea|strong="G2532"\w*, the deep \w things|strong="G0899"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* of a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w save|strong="G1487"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w man|strong="G0444"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*? \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w knoweth|strong="G1492"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w received|strong="G2983"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we might \w know|strong="G1492"\w* the things \w that|strong="G3588"\w* are freely \w given|strong="G5483"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Which \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* we \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w words|strong="G3056"\w* which \w man’s|strong="G0442"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w teacheth|strong="G1318"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w which|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \w teacheth|strong="G1318"\w*; \w comparing|strong="G4793"\w* spiritual \w things|strong="G4152"\w* with \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w natural|strong="G5591"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w receiveth|strong="G1209"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w are|strong="G2076"\w* \w foolishness|strong="G3472"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* he \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \add them\add*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they are \w spiritually|strong="G4153"\w* \w discerned|strong="G0350"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w judgeth|strong="G0350"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* he \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* is \w judged|strong="G0350"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* hath \w known|strong="G1097"\w* the \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* he may \w instruct|strong="G4822"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*? \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* the \w mind|strong="G3563"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
